title: ContextDoc
description: Lightweight YAML companion file documenting what source code cannot express. All sections are optional â€” use only what adds value.

purpose.description: One line. What this file does, not how.

tensions.description: The most important section. Architectural decisions that look wrong but are intentional, or constraints that must not be broken without careful reconsideration.

workflows.description: Key flows expressed as readable sequences. Only flows that are non-obvious or span multiple components.

todos.description: Pending work in the context of this specific file.

conceptualTests.description: Declarative, language-agnostic test scenarios. Describe what the system should do, not how to test it.

name.description: Short name for the test scenario

action.description: What the user or system does

ref.description: Links to external documents for context too large to inline.
